title: Accounts
context: §28-7 Accounts. The attorney general shall account, in the manner provided by law, for all fees, bills of costs and other moneys collected or received by the attorney general by virtue of the attorney general&rsquo;s office. [L 1866, p 17; am L 1923, c 35, §1; RL 1925, §1492; am L 1931, c 59, §1; RL 1935, §506; RL 1945, §1507; RL 1955, §30-7; HRS §28-7; gen ch 1993] Cross References Generally, see §40-31.
